website_summaries.verdict: These paints have a few quirks like the small portions and weak blue shade, but overall they are quality paints that last and provide variety for a reasonable price.
pros: Set of six bright colors that produce a neon glow under UV or blacklighting
They dry quickly and wash off easily with soap and water
cons: The color of the blue paint isn't as vibrant as the other shades
Tubes are small, but the paint goes a long way for most applications

customer_reviews.title: So, these tubes were a lot smaller than I ...
customer_reviews.text: So, these tubes were a lot smaller than I expected, but the paint goes a log ways! I gave each blacklight dodgeball team of 6 one tube and they all cam back with their faces covered. Could not believe it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh..👎
customer_reviews.text: They are tiny. Definitely not wroth the money the tube wasn’t full..total waste.
customer_reviews.author: angelica rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: This product doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for her bday party at the skating ring where they use mult black lights It didn’t glow at all the the paint was clumpy
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: more than enough for a tween party of 20+ girls. i thought the tubes were small, but only a little bit of product was needed. glowed like fire under blacklights!! girls did their faces and eventually their t shirts etc. colors are bright under black lights, stayed on well and came off skin and furniture with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Alicia T.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These were the hit of my daughters glow b-day party. They really glow under a blacklight and work beautifully for face painting. All the girls absolutely loved them. I also appreciated how well they clean up. A bit smudged on my couch and I was able to wipe up the smudge with a wet microfiber cloth. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good for face painting but not enough for the entire ...
customer_reviews.text: The tubes are small. Good for face painting but not enough for the entire body.I purchased this for my daughter's 13th GLOW party and 16 kids were able to do some sort of face design- heart or peace signs on their cheeks, lines under the eyes and on the eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Schmelzer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the colors!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned after reading a few of the reviews regarding the sizes of the tubes. Yes, they are small but more than enough for my daughters Glow in the Dark Dance Rave Party. The girls loved them and they glowed so brightly under the black light... We had 7 kids and plenty left over for the adults!
customer_reviews.author: C. Conroy

customer_reviews.title: TRIAL SIZES!! NOT FULL SIZE!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a rip off! The sizes are not accurately represented. There is not enough of any color for body painting. Go to an Adult toy store. Amazon does not offer a good, complete selection.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value!
customer_reviews.text: As little as these are, you don't need much paint! Kids loved them. Just make sure they're wearing old clothes. The paint is definitely not coming out of her dress!
customer_reviews.author: MarthaL

customer_reviews.title: Great to paint with, really REALLY long-lasting, easy to take off
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this glow really nicely, it painted on nicely...didn't run, we were able to do designs with and without stencils, just with regular paint brushes. It looked good with and without the glow lights. We did a 5k in this stuff. It rained. And then we went to a dance party. By the end of the night, we were all still glowing, still pretty. And when I got home, it came off easily with soap and water...not even scrubbing. I can't say enough great things about this paint! If you are doing a glow run, or if you just want some glow paint for whatever, this is awesome stuff.
customer_reviews.author: GrayMatters

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This paint was amazing!!! A must have for any black lighy party. The glow was fabulous. It was super easy to clean up. we got it everywhere bc we were too excited to let it dry. our golfcart was covered on the seats, windows, etc it came off super easy with water. I will buy this every year!!! Love love love!!
customer_reviews.author: scott grandey

customer_reviews.title: SMALL AMOUNTS! But great product so far.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girls to have glow-in-the-dark bath parties. One thing I didn't realize was that the bottles are tiny! This is probably my fault for not paying attention to the amount, but just a heads up. My blacklight hasn't arrived yet so I used a plant grow light that has a blue light, and that worked great for all colors except blue and green, surprisingly! Very, very fun product. And a note for parents - my daughter spilled some paint all over her clothes. I immediately threw them in the wash and am happy to report it 100% came out. Buying more now!
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put on and nice
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on and nice, pigmented colors. Used it for a foam glow run and looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Bad ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: This crap paint contains formaldehyde obviously if it broke out three people after applying it within 2 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Adams

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy!! It doesn't run which is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!!! I used it for a black light run and it barely smeared. I've used those crayons before but because they have wax they always ran. And I'm doing a fun run so of course I'm going to sweat but this is a pic of me at the end ... still there and I even wiped my face by mistake. It glowed way more than 5he stuff they even sold at the race.
customer_reviews.author: jena

customer_reviews.title: Get your glow on
customer_reviews.text: Used these for glow yoga and they worked so well. They were clearly visible in the black lights and were easy to apply. They have good consistency so can be put on with fingers or using a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Tarot

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED LOVED LOVED IT! They were amazing for my glow in the dark party! The only thing that made me kinda sad was that they are really small tubes and I wanted to get my guests to paint their faces too... Definetily UV light reactive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glows, stays, perfect for party with and without UV light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a late night "Space Jam" party and it delivered! Definitely would recommend, I've used it multiple times now Pros: Glows without blacklight due to bright color, -glows BRILLIANTLY with blacklight -easy application with a finger, cotton swab, or paint brush -easy wash off removal with water (and soap if needed) -stayed on while sweating (and I was sweating like crazy) -didn't rub onto other people Cons: -honestly can't think of any? not having enough reasons to use it? haha -would be better if there was a fine applicator tip to help with distribution for use
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: ... got this for halloween for the kids - they loved it. Remember its not glow inthe dark though
customer_reviews.text: I got this for halloween for the kids - they loved it. Remember its not glow inthe dark though! its for black lights!
customer_reviews.author: Christina H

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: The colors were as described and looked great even without the glow in the dark properties . . . . but when we found a blacklight at a party the paints looked even better! I HIGHLY recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: N2ND79

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit at the party! Glows awesome in a blacklight.
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit at the party! Glows awesome in a blacklight.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It worked great and everyone loved it
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for painting faces at our summer camp carnival night, featuring black lights. It worked great and everyone loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J. White

customer_reviews.title: A great buy, will buy again if i ever run
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY BRIGHT under black lights!! The blue doesnt look that bright in the bottle but once under the light it is. I dont really understand some of the reviews on here, the paint goes a long way for sure. A great buy, will buy again if i ever run out
customer_reviews.author: Cuppity

customer_reviews.title: Great for a glow run
customer_reviews.text: My family of seven used these for a 5K Glow Run. The little bottles were big enough for everyone to paint their faces as they wanted and still had a lot left over. The blue doesn't show up under the black lights but it looks good in normal lighting situations.
customer_reviews.author: MathanielTop Contributor: Minecraft

customer_reviews.title: Paint glow!
customer_reviews.text: Kids enjoy painting their faces with these! They are water base so they are ao easy to remove and wipe.
customer_reviews.author: John York

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect! We used these at a party with just two or three uv lights and it looked awesome. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Purplesita

customer_reviews.title: The intensity of the glow is terrific under black light
customer_reviews.text: These are small tubes, about the size of my thumb. The intensity of the glow is terrific under black light. A little bit goes a long way. you can thin the paint to get a softer effect. There wasn't much difference between the orange and pink paint, when viewed under black light.
customer_reviews.author: John Enright

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes them look like larger or medium size bottles. But they are really small
customer_reviews.author: Love jones

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with how well the paint glowed and how great ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a glow party for my son and used this product to paint the kids faces. Though other reviews comment on the size of the tubes, a little of this paint goes a long way. I was very pleased with how well the paint glowed and how great it looked as just a colorful face paint in the light. Product went on smooth and came off easily. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: H Pines

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: These are very bright under actual black lights and even under the LED black lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great for a dance!
customer_reviews.text: Used this at a dance party for sixth grade students as a face painting station: they loved this!!!!!!!! stayed on the whole night!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Iriarte

customer_reviews.title: Burning sensation on skin
customer_reviews.text: This product made all of our guest feel like their skin was burning. We all washed it off immediately. I do not recommend it. They didn't glow well either. I was disappointed by the product in general.
customer_reviews.author: MEP

customer_reviews.title: Item not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Item not as advertised. Not eligible for return. So disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Blue doesn't glow very well under blacklight
customer_reviews.text: Most of the colors look amazing under the blacklights, they all stay on wonderfully for hours, and wash off with just water. The blue, however, didn't seem to glow as well as the others, which was a shame. The tubes are small, being just .34 oz, but you don't need very much paint for it to glow. As for skin sensitivity, I have sensitive skin and the paint never bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Small tubes but they go a long way!
customer_reviews.text: These tubes are very small but they go a long way! The colors were bright and really popped under the black light. I was a little surprised at the size and thought I wouldn't have enough to do what I needed but I painted 3 faces and still have some left over. I thought it was a good value for the price. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi W.

customer_reviews.title: But they worked great! We had a blast messing around painting our ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Girl Scout glow and the dark themed overnight. The paint tubes are very small. Much smaller than I thought they would be when looking at the pictures. But they worked great! We had a blast messing around painting our faces and arms!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed. HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, just so everyone knows, these folks clearly advertised them as "UV" glow paints. But I didn't realize this and so when I put them on for students to run around in the dark, I was disappointed. HOWEVER, they ARE quality paints and I appreciated their follow-up email. Good product and good service. I gave 4 instead of 5 stars because I would've like these bottles to be a bit bigger - hold more paint, but it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Barksdale

customer_reviews.title: Glow! No allergic reactions, easy to remove with water!
customer_reviews.text: Looove them, they glow!!! Easy to apply, no allergic reaction (my skin is very sensitive), no side effects at all, easy to remove with just water, they glooow with black light and UV lights. Just perfect, go for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica B

customer_reviews.title: When I first received the package I was disappointed in the size of the bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as depicted and glowed amazingly under Black Light. When I first received the package I was disappointed in the size of the bottles, however, was suprised at how much was in 1 bottle. I was able to use a significant amount on 15 kids/ adults and still have plenty left over. Must use under black light to maximize the glow. I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these paints. They stayed on the skin for a while even with sweating and were a hit. No allergic reaction. Were very bright under the UV light. I even used them on dollar store balloons to paint polka dots on them and they dried quickly on those as well and were very bright too.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette Roberson

customer_reviews.title: These look bigger in the picture. They are just ...
customer_reviews.text: These look bigger in the picture. They are just little tube, but as long as they work that's what's important.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a neon blacklight party
customer_reviews.text: Smaller tubes rhan expected but for the price it was good! All the colors looked amazing unde black light, used. Glow stick to apply dots and draw shapes, blue doesnt glow as much as the others but they washed off skin and even white walls reasonably well with warm water soap. Takes a couple mins to dry completely but stays on the whole night!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for glow parties
customer_reviews.text: The paint glowed the whole time on kids face and arms. Although the tubes was tiny they worked. The glow party lasted for 5 hrs, but I'm sure the paint would've lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Moni Babi

customer_reviews.title: For them other folks .
customer_reviews.text: If your down for raving . spicing things up or just being neon colors randomly this is well worth the money . it washes off easily . don t make too much of a mess either if you are careful . kinda more like an oil based type paint as far as texture . which is better as it spreads more evenly . I'd strongly recommend getting some sponge type brushes to use with it
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: DON’t WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: SO NOT HAPPY with this item. Tried to return them but apparently it’s not returnable. Do not waste your money buying this item!!!
customer_reviews.author: HPMOM

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: i love it. they are great and look so good in black light and even outside they are really bright. the paint on us in the picture is this paint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong glow, thin consistency
customer_reviews.text: Thin and almost runny so you can't face paint with them. But they did glow really well so we used them to fill in the designs or add embellishments. I'd buy again!
customer_reviews.author: E. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Basic glow paint
customer_reviews.text: Tried applying with brush and sponge. Brush left stoke marks and sponge didn’t spread well. After washing it off, BLUE left a temporary residue that took a few hours to come off completely.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyPRN

customer_reviews.title: LOOK AT OUR LIPS, THEY GLOW!!! YAY!
customer_reviews.text: Pink and Orange glow the same color (orange) but they look great!!!! PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these yet. I just wanted to remind buyers to look at the size. They are tiny! Ha I did not pay attention to how small the tubes of paint are.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: It was great bright paint
customer_reviews.text: It was great bright paint, but it is a little drippy and gets on everything you don't want it to while you are trying to paint a child's face. The tubes were also much smaller than I expected but I think you don't need a lot and it does wash off easy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! I mixed them about 3:1 water-to-paint and put them in a spray bottle to do splatter-stencil effects. The blue is less reactive than the others, at least with the blacklight source I was using (these:)
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tipton-king

customer_reviews.title: CLEANS SO EASILY AND GLOWS SO BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Very cool under the UV light but more importantly during a college party where the paint got on the walls and furniture.... IT ALL CAME OUT VERY EASILY WITH JUST A WASHCLOTH! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Sam Sonnabend

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's alright body paint. The colors are good for a rave but it doesn't come off very easy and spreads around if you sweat. Definitely better options out there but this is fine
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: it packs a great punch! The item arrived quickly and after painting ...
customer_reviews.text: Although the tubes are small, it packs a great punch! The item arrived quickly and after painting faces and turning on the black light....we were immediately happy with this product and purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: Glow spin calss
customer_reviews.text: These little tubes go a long way, I paint my face when teaching glow in the dark spin classes and they are super bright. We have a black light in the room I should point out. The members love it. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: ericabeth

customer_reviews.title: Double check on the size.
customer_reviews.text: Product was smaller than expected and not worth the price. It is great and does glow with fluorescent light. For that price I expected a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Miramontes

customer_reviews.title: Super bright and pigmented
customer_reviews.text: These paints are PERFECT! Glowing under blacklight is a bonus because true story, it pays off with the lights on during the day. I will be ordering more just to have on hand. Priced reasonably too
customer_reviews.author: Angelphase

customer_reviews.title: Very small tubes of day glo body paint.
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. My one complaint is that the tubes of paint are TINY. like you could probably paint one arm up to the elbow before you run out.
customer_reviews.author: jack mackenroth

customer_reviews.title: Looks excellent under blacklight
customer_reviews.text: The paint was easy to apply, although I did two layers because you could see the brush strokes with just the first layer. It maintained the pattern over a long evening. It looked fine under normal light, but main thing is it looked really fantastic under the blacklight, everyone was dazzled!
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters "GLOW" birthday party. The tubes are tiny, but I am telling you......a little goes a looooong way! I was able to paint 9 people faces with this and still have a lot left over!
customer_reviews.author: Shana Olivas

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: decent, but wash off too easily, you dont even need soap. wish they were a little more durable. green and blue are not that bright. tubes are about as long as my pinkie. other than that decent and glowy!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Wörrle

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, very vibrant
customer_reviews.text: These things are kinda small so don't expect full on body art for too long. I shared between 4 and ran out fairly quickly. It's better to use on 1-2 people if you're trying to get painted head to toe
customer_reviews.author: Mellow

customer_reviews.title: Very vibrant under the blacklight and still looked very pretty in normal light
customer_reviews.text: Very vibrant under the blacklight and still looked very pretty in normal light. Had a lot of people use the multiple tunes I bought. Used sparingly but went a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Good for large projects not small details
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, not buildable, gunky formula, but great UV coloration
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Sprengelmeyer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect touch!
customer_reviews.text: This paint looks awesome! So unique and fun. If the size of the product was larger I’d most definitely had given them five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amizon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Small but great for glow party
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son glow party. These are tiny but a little goes a long way. They glowed in the dark, and every kid loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Maxville

customer_reviews.title: I received open products
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the containers where opened at the bottom of the tubes where it was supposed to be sealed off, but since it wasn’t PAINT WAS EVERYWHERE INSIDE THE PACKAGE. When I dumped the package contents on my white countertops before realizing they were open... I had to use Clorox to get all that paint up. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly bey

customer_reviews.title: Work Great Under a Black Light, Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome body paints. Used them on my daughter and her friends for a glow-in-the-dark performance they did. The paints show up bright under a black light. The lighter colors show up much better though than the darker.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Bright Colorful - Stays on and comes off easily
customer_reviews.text: Got these body paints to entertain my grandkids (and me) while we are "Staying in Place." My Granddaughter painted herself and her two brothers and we had the best Glow Dance Party! I was a little worried that someone would have a skin reaction, but it came off so easy and not even a hint of any redness on anyone. We even added a little to the dogs collars - great product!
customer_reviews.author: L Keedy

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product! The only thing is that the paint isn't very opaque, and if you lay a matching paint water color body paint down it'll strip the layer away if you don't set it first. But other than that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deane

customer_reviews.title: Not kinky
customer_reviews.text: I have black lights in the basement. My son and his friends play laser tag at night under just the black lights. I have a few in the yard too. So I got body paint for them to try in one of their games. For their faces.
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: You will want to layer it on, and some colors are obviously going to be more noticeable than others... but this stuff was perfect. Went to a blacklight party at a bar with my roommate and we were a HIT with our paint on!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Nellis

customer_reviews.title: Bright stuff
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition to a teen blacklight party! Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: MOM2*3*kids

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Halloween. We gave out candy with blacklights lighting up the porch and the kids really enjoyed that we were " dressed-up" too
customer_reviews.author: SurfCaster

customer_reviews.title: They GLOW a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product, i thought it wasnt gonna last me because the tubes are small but with only a sml amount you can create a stunning look!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Glow party
customer_reviews.text: It will go perfect with your glow party when you will paint the kids face.
customer_reviews.author: Briceon Monk

customer_reviews.title: didnt get sun with it on so idk if the uv reaction is good or not when it gets dark
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is crazy bright in the day time as well. didnt get sun with it on so idk if the uv reaction is good or not when it gets dark, but it does glow very nicely in sunlight
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a glow 5k
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to wash off. Glad it came out of my clothes when I accidentally got some on them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bender

customer_reviews.title: Small bottles but great product
customer_reviews.text: very bright under appropriate lights. Lots of fun. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Z

customer_reviews.title: easy clean up and very florescent
customer_reviews.text: The tubes were smaller than I imagined but the description does say the size, it was the photo that mislead me. Nevertheless, we had plenty of paint for our Black light 5K. We received compliments on our face paint and people asked where they could some! I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Small tubes but works well
customer_reviews.text: Small tubes but works for many faces, used for a glow in the dark volleyball party to do face paint for designated teams
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Highly pigmented in my opinion and easy to paint on skin. Used them for a 5k glow run and they were noticeable on face.
customer_reviews.author: LaSo

customer_reviews.title: Loved loved this paint!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this face paint for my daughters 16th birthday blacklight glow party.I had 15 girls and they painted their hands and faces with it and still had plenty left.This paint was very bright and dark not only when the lights where on but electric when the lights went out.I purchased tons and tons of glow items and this product was the biggest hit and made the most impact for the party!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color!
customer_reviews.text: I'm all about writing truthful reviews! So here it is, at first considering the price and how tiny the bottles are, I was hesitant of my husband ordering them. However, once they came in and he applied them, the color was exceptional and it has a lot more paint than you'd think. Also, the Cora are very bright and neon, as he ordered them! Totally happy!
customer_reviews.author: Binker Stormant

customer_reviews.title: Small tubes
customer_reviews.text: This is black light body paint not what i was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One was a dud.
customer_reviews.text: 5 of them look great... unfortunately one did NOT glow at all... the tubes are tiny so one not glowing is a waste... if you don’t need red then this is great! Very unfortunate one was falsely advertised. It was either the pink or the red.
customer_reviews.author: Crys Cee

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: In regular lighting, the colours are beautiful! It’s easy to apply though you have to be careful to get an even application. Under blacklight, the yellow and green look pretty similar to one another, as does the pink, orange, and pink-purple color. Overall, it’s a good product and I’d buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: AP 001

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful under blacklight. Great quality & easy to wash off
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Russell

customer_reviews.title: Im sure the paint works fine and glows fabulously
customer_reviews.text: Im sure the paint works fine and glows fabulously, but make sure you look up what 0.34 Oz looks like. It's NOT even a full ounce each tube is about the size of a Bic lighter. Probably good for one time use only, on 1 large person/adult or 2 small people/children as you will use all of it in one go. The tubes are TINY. the end.. added a pic. Notice the lighter at the end , it kind of blends in. Theyre just the same size!
customer_reviews.author: Nefie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glow, easy to apply and remove.
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of fun with this paint for a Halloween stream, glowed nicely under my black light.
customer_reviews.author: Alien3D

customer_reviews.title: Hard to wash off, but nice colors under light
customer_reviews.text: Cons, Very hard to wash off, took three showers. It also flaked off while it was on. Pros, Nice bright colors and showed up well under a UV light.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn S

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I used these paints for painting pumpkins and actually worked really well! Showed up great under the black light and the kids loved it. I liked that they could get it all over them and not worrying because it's body paint!
customer_reviews.author: Elise C.

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product for our children to wear at the Sky Zone trampoline park during their Friday night GlowZone parties. The kids have so much fun with them! They are easy to use, and easy to wipe off. The colors are great!
customer_reviews.author: juliana wooley

customer_reviews.title: These are really cool. They are tiny little tubes
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool. They are tiny little tubes, but a little does a lot. Even if you wipe it on your skin and can barely see it with the lights on, it's very bright under a black light!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Not all colors as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was missing red ink they gave me extra orange smh
customer_reviews.author: Smileylilgiant

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The face paint looked so cool for our glow in the dark party. We had black lights on and they were glowing.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Stewart

customer_reviews.title: They glow great but all colors are just 2 colors only yellow ...
customer_reviews.text: They glow great but all colors are just 2 colors only yellow or orange even though you get other colors they still appear as yellow or orange.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte hale

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Not full coverage hard to get a solid color on face
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Soaked into skin, didn't glow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a fun festival accessory, and it didn't work. what a bummer! It was translucent and unless you left a clump of it on your skin, it would simply rub in like lotion- it also wasn't visible under black light. I wasted my money on this!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Kole

product_meta.title: UV Glow Blacklight Face and Body Paint 0.34oz - Set of 6 Tubes - Neon Fluorescent
product_meta.description: UV Glow Face & Body Paint is one of the most recognisable products in the industry. Suitable for both day and night use. This set includes 6 vivid colours. Bright, neon coloured under normal lighting, the paints give off an immense fluorescent glow under UV Lighting / Blacklights. These paints are easily applied, dry quickly on the skin and last all night. Simply wash off with water after use. Pack includes 1x Pink, Orange, Red, Yellow, Green and Blue.
feature_bullets: Blacklight Reactive - Glows Brightly under UV Lighting
Dries Quickly and washes off easily with water
Ideal for Clubbing, Festivals and anywhere with UV Lighting
